name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six/RainbowSix.exe

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six/RainbowSix.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win98
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert disc 1
    requires: RAINBOWSIX.exe
- task:
    description: Installing Rainbow Six
    executable: $DISC/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
